imdb.plot outline: Follow the colorful crew of the Baker/Curb NASCAR racing team before, during and after the races... Combined with some of Country Music's hottest stars, past and present, see the ups and down from the inside out of what it takes to be champions on the NASCAR circuit and how off the track they actively are involved in their communities and helping better the lives of those around them.
imdb.title: Music & Motors
plot: Follow the colorful crew of the Baker/Curb NASCAR racing team before, during and after the races...
